concept.title: 452.237-78 Contracts with Consulting Firms for Services.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 437.270(b), insert a clause substantially as follows:
Contracts with Consulting Firms for Services (FEB 1988)

Offerors are specifically cautioned that any firm(s) receiving a contract award to provide the services described herein will be prohibited from competing for or receiving a follow-on contract to perform ______.*
* Contracting Officer shall insert the appropriate information.
